price: 126. En aan Allah behoort alles wat in de hemelen is en alles wat op aarde is. En Allah omvat altijd alle zaken.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
